thread.title: Rahul Gandhi meets TN farmers, asks PM Narendra Modi to give ‘debt relief to the people who built this country’
thread.title_full: Rahul Gandhi meets TN farmers, asks PM Narendra Modi to give ‘debt relief to the people who built this country’

author: FE Online
title: Rahul Gandhi meets TN farmers, asks PM Narendra Modi to give ‘debt relief to the people who built this country’
text:
India news Rahul Gandhi meets TN farmers, asks PM Narendra Modi to give ‘debt relief to the people who built this country’ Rahul Gandhi meets TN farmers, asks PM Narendra Modi to give ‘debt relief to the people who built this country’ Congress VP Rahul Gandhi on Friday met the Tamil Nadu farmers who are protesting at the Jantar Mantar, Delhi for drought relief funds. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: March 31, 2017 1:38 PM Congress VP Rahul Gandhi with TN farmers. (ANI) 
Congress Vice President Rahul Gandhi on Friday met the Tamil Nadu farmers who are protesting at the Jantar Mantar, Delhi for drought relief funds. While addressing the media he talked about Prime Minister Narendra Modi giving relief to the rich and not the poor. He said, “PM has given debt relief to richest people in the country, why not for people who have built this country, the farmers.” He further added, “Inki (TN farmers) awaaz na Hindustan ki sarkar aur na hi PM ko sunayi deti hai. PM ki zimedaari hai ki inki baat sunein. (Their voices do not reach either the Indian Government or PM Modi. It is the responsibility of the PM to listen to them.)” 
Further details awaited.
